si.title: புதிய தலைவர் பதவியேற்பு
body_lines: ග්රාමීය, නාගරික සංවර්ධන හා නිවාස හා නිවාස හා ඉදිකිරීම් අමාත්ය විජිත හේරා විසින් ඔහු පත් කර ඇත.

en.title: புதிய தலைவர் பதவியேற்பு
body_lines: He has been appointed by the Minister of Rural, Urban Development and Housing and Construction, Vijitha Hera.

summary_lines: "New leader appointment: Vijitha Hera, Minister of Rural, Urban Development and Housing and Construction, appoints a new head."
